  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AstrologerStaff
    A weapon which can be bought and sold, wielded by Astrologers.
    AxeOfGodrick
    Godrick's phase one axe weapon, can perform a spinning attack Created by:
    Club
    A simple weapon that can be used to attack the enemy.
    GiantCrabClaw
    Giant crab claw of the giant crab Only used in its slam attack It deals 208 damage with 90% hit rate
    GiantCrayfishPincer
    Giant pincer of the giant crayfish Only used in its slam attack It deals 527 damage with 100% hit rate
    GiantDogHead
    Giant head of the giant dog Only used in its slam attack It deals 314 damage with 90% hit rate
    GiantWeapon
    A class of weapons that utilize the slam action important to note, these are weapons not weapon items, they function similarly to intrinsic weapons but are only returned in aoe capable enemies getAoEWeapon() method
    GraftedDragon
    Godrick's phase two flame weapon, can perform a flamethrower aoe attack Created by:
    GreatKnife
    A weapon which can be bought and sold, and has a special skill "Quickstep".
    Grossmesser
    Grossmesser weapon item used by heavy skeletal swordsmen It deals 115 damage with 85% hit rate also can be used to perform a spinning attack
    HeavyCrossbow
    Heavy Crossbow weapon item used by Godrick's soldiers It deals 64 damage with 57% hit rate
    Scimitar
    Scimitar weapon item used by skeletal bandits It deals 118 damage with 88% hit rate also can be used to perform a spinning attack
    Sword
    A class of weapon items that utilize the spinning attack action
    TradableWeapon
    A weapon which can be bought and sold.
    Uchigatana
    A weapon which can be bought and sold, and has a special skill "Unsheathe".
